H0.text: Which river forms almost all the boundary between Devon and Cornwall. River Exe

H1.text: Which river forms almost all the boundary between Devon and Cornwall. River Dart

H2.text: Which river forms almost all the boundary between Devon and Cornwall. River Teign

H3.text: Which river forms almost all the boundary between Devon and Cornwall. Tamar

A4.text: The Tamar is a river in south west England that forms most of the border between Devon (to the east) and Cornwall (to the west).

A5.text: The modern administrative border between Devon and Cornwall more closely follows the Tamar and Hamoaze than the 'historic' county border (of the 11th to 19th centuries).
